trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 셀의 테두리 스타일을 포함 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤 완벽 하 게 셀과 머리글의 테두리를 포함 하 여 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>가 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>셀 테두리의 모양을 설정할 수 있는 속성이 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 테두리를 추가로 사용자 지정 해야 할 경우 DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle 클래스 셀의 각 측면에 있는 테두리의 스타일 설정 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>각각 DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle의 속성을 나타내는 왼쪽, 오른쪽, 위쪽 및 아래쪽 테두리 셀의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 속성을 설정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>셀 사이의 테두리에 대 한 다양 한 모양 되려면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 모든 셀의 테두리의 테두리 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>동일한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>속성 값이 모든 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> 에 속성이 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> 및</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 값이이 속성은 올바른 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때 지정 된 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance was retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -또는-지정된 된 값이이 속성을 설정할 때 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>, 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> 통해 검색 된 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 아래쪽 테두리 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 값이이 속성은 올바른 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때 지정 된 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스의 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the top border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 위쪽 테두리에 대 한 스타일을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.target: 나타내는 문자열을 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 값이 포함 된 문자열을 반환 하는 ToString 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>

trans-unit.target: 나타내는 string는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.
